body_html: Mmm, building TF on CentOS 5 looks like a joke. Besides, nvidia/cuda:8.0 is already used, it is still Ubuntu 14.04 - the perfect ABI balance IMHO. I would explicitly write in the docs that TF's "manylinux1" is actually not manylinux1 in the strict definition and it should be enough.
body_text: Mmm, building TF on CentOS 5 looks like a joke. Besides, nvidia/cuda:8.0 is already used, it is still Ubuntu 14.04 - the perfect ABI balance IMHO. I would explicitly write in the docs that TF's "manylinux1" is actually not manylinux1 in the strict definition and it should be enough.
body: Mmm, building TF on CentOS 5 looks like a joke. Besides, nvidia/cuda:8.0 is already used, it is still Ubuntu 14.04 - the perfect ABI balance IMHO. I would explicitly write in the docs that TF's "manylinux1" is actually not manylinux1 in the strict definition and it should be enough.
